topic.title: conrefbreaksxref source
topic.shortdesc: This topic conrefs to another, which uses xref internally.

section.title: Section that is pulled to another topic.
section.p: Look as the figure in this section: Figure 1.
Look at a figure in this topic, outside of this section: Figure 2
Now look at this topic: conrefbreaksxref targetThis topic is referenced by another, and has some internal linking.
